verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחַר֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וְהָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> that God נִסָּ֖ה <WH5254> did tempt אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> Abraham וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> unto him Abraham וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> Here

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> And he said קַח־ <WH3947> Take now נָ֠א <WH4994> now אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֨ <WH1121> thy son אֶת־ <WH853> יְחִֽידְךָ֤ <WH3173> thine only אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אָהַ֙בְתָּ֙ <WH157> whom thou lovest אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> [son] Isaac וְלֶךְ־ <WH1980> and go לְךָ֔ אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land הַמֹּרִיָּ֑ה <WH4179> of Moriah וְהַעֲלֵ֤הוּ <WH5927> and offer him שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there לְעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> there for a burnt offering עַ֚ל <WH5921> on אַחַ֣ד <WH259> upon one הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> of the mountains אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> of which אֹמַ֥ר <WH559> which I will tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> rose up early אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> And Abraham בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַֽיַּחֲבֹשׁ֙ <WH2280> and saddled אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֹר֔וֹ <WH2543> his ass וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> two נְעָרָיו֙ <WH5288> of his young men אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> with him and Isaac בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיְבַקַּע֙ <WH1234> and clave עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> the wood עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> for the burnt offering וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> and rose up וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which אָֽמַר־ <WH559> had told ל֥וֹ הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of which God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <WH7992> Then on the third וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted up אַבְרָהָ֧ם <WH85> Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֛יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> the place מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <WH7350> afar off

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> to his נְעָרָ֗יו <WH5288> unto his young men שְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> Abide לָכֶ֥ם פֹּה֙ <WH6311> here עִֽם־ <WH5973> with הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> ye here with the ass וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וְהַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> and I and the lad נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> will go עַד־ <WH5704> against כֹּ֑ה <WH3541> yonder וְנִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <WH7812> and worship וְנָשׁ֥וּבָה <WH7725> and come again אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> the wood הָעֹלָ֗ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <WH7760> and laid עַל־ <WH5921> on יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> [it] upon Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and he took בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> the fire וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <WH3979> and a knife וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> walked שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> both יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> of them together

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> spake יִצְחָ֜ק <WH3327> And Isaac אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֤ם <WH85> unto Abraham אָבִיו֙ <WH1> his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אָבִ֔י <WH1> My father וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and he said הִנֶּ֣נִּֽי <WH2009> Here בְנִ֑י <WH1121> Here [am] I my son וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> Behold the fire וְהָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <WH6086> and the wood וְאַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> where הַשֶּׂ֖ה <WH7716> but where [is] the lamb לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> the burnt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> And Abraham אֱלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> God יִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> will provide לּ֥וֹ הַשֶּׂ֛ה <WH7716> himself a lamb לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> My son וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> walked שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> both of them יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> And they came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הַמָּקוֹם֮ <WH4725> to the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which אָֽמַר־ <WH559> had told ל֣וֹ הָאֱלֹהִים֒ <WH430> which God וַיִּ֨בֶן <WH1129> built שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> him of and Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> an altar וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <WH6186> in order אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> the wood וַֽיַּעֲקֹד֙ <WH6123> and bound אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> and laid אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> him on the altar מִמַּ֖עַל <WH4605> upon לָעֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> the wood

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> stretched forth אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <WH3979> the knife לִשְׁחֹ֖ט <WH7819> to slay אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> But מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> unto him out of heaven וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אַבְרָהָ֣ם ׀ <WH85> Abraham אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> Abraham וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> Here

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> Lay יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> not thine hand אֶל־ <WH413> upon הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> the lad וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> neither do thou ל֖וֹ מְא֑וּמָּה <WH3972> any thing כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> unto him for now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְרֵ֤א <WH3373> that thou fearest אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> seeing thou hast not חָשַׂ֛כְתָּ <WH2820> withheld אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֥ <WH1121> thy son אֶת־ <WH853> יְחִידְךָ֖ <WH3173> thine only מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted up אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold אַ֔יִל <WH352> [him] a ram אַחַ֕ר <WH310> and behold behind נֶאֱחַ֥ז <WH270> caught בַּסְּבַ֖ךְ <WH5442> in a thicket בְּקַרְנָ֑יו <WH7161> by his horns וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> and Abraham וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> the ram וַיַּעֲלֵ֥הוּ <WH5927> and offered him up לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> in the stead בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> of his son

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> called אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> And Abraham שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> it shall be seen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> as יֵאָמֵ֣ר <WH559> it is said הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> [to] this day בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> In the mount יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> will be provided

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> called מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> unto Abraham שֵׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> the second time מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> out of heaven

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And said בִּ֥י נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7650> By myself have I sworn נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֗י <WH3588> for יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> thou hast done אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and hast not חָשַׂ֖כְתָּ <WH2820> withheld אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֥ <WH1121> thy son אֶת־ <WH853> יְחִידֶֽךָ׃ <WH3173> thine only

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed בָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> That in blessing אֲבָרֶכְךָ֗ <WH1288> I will bless וְהַרְבָּ֨ה <WH7235> thee and in multiplying אַרְבֶּ֤ה <WH7235> I will multiply אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> thy seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֣י <WH3556> as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וְכַח֕וֹל <WH2344> and as the sand אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> shore הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> which [is] upon the sea וְיִרַ֣שׁ <WH3423> shall possess זַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> and thy seed אֵ֖ת <WH853> שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> the gate אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> of his enemies

וְהִתְבָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> be blessed בְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> And in thy seed כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all גּוֹיֵ֣י <WH1471> shall all the nations הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth עֵ֕קֶב <WH6118> because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <WH8085> thou hast obeyed בְּקֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> my voice

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> returned אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> So Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> to his נְעָרָ֔יו <WH5288> unto his young men וַיָּקֻ֛מוּ <WH6965> and they rose up וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> and went יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> to Beersheba וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> and Abraham בִּבְאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> at Beersheba פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַיֻּגַּ֥ד <WH5046> that it was told לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> Abraham לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold יָלְדָ֨ה <WH3205> she hath also born מִלְכָּ֥ה <WH4435> Behold Milcah גַם־ <WH1571> also הִ֛וא <WH1931> he בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children לְנָח֥וֹר <WH5152> Nahor אָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> unto thy brother

אֶת־ <WH853> ע֥וּץ <WH5780> Huz בְּכֹר֖וֹ <WH1060> his firstborn וְאֶת־ <WH853> בּ֣וּז <WH938> and Buz אָחִ֑יו <WH251> his brother וְאֶת־ <WH853> קְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH7055> and Kemuel אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> of Aram

וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֶּ֣שֶׂד <WH3777> And Chesed וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲז֔וֹ <WH2375> and Hazo וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּלְדָּ֖שׁ <WH6394> and Pildash וְאֶת־ <WH853> יִדְלָ֑ף <WH3044> and Jidlaph וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> בְּתוּאֵֽל׃ <WH1328> and Bethuel

וּבְתוּאֵ֖ל <WH1328> And Bethuel יָלַ֣ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> רִבְקָ֑ה <WH7259> Rebekah שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> these eight אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these יָלְדָ֣ה <WH3205> did bear מִלְכָּ֔ה <WH4435> Milcah לְנָח֖וֹר <WH5152> to Nahor אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> Abraham's

וּפִֽילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <WH6370> And his concubine וּשְׁמָ֣הּ <WH8034> whose name רְאוּמָ֑ה <WH7208> [was] Reumah וַתֵּ֤לֶד <WH3205> she bare גַּם־ <WH1571> also הִוא֙ <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> טֶ֣בַח <WH2875> also Tebah וְאֶת־ <WH853> גַּ֔חַם <WH1514> and Gaham וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּ֖חַשׁ <WH8477> and Thahash וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעֲכָֽה׃ <WH4601> and Maachah ס
